Thanks for ULing this! 

I have ULed the same aircraft with a flight dynamics patch to make the VTOL function work like it should. 

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4837981

If your client will let you do it, you can just download the patch separately from that same torrent and apply it to the aircraft in this torrent.

You also need FSUIPC 4.0 or higher to make it work - that is also available in that same torrent.

Again, thanks for uploading the original file!
